mapper.sql: id, parentId, questionId,factionId,commentNum,likeNum,trampleNum,reportNum, userId, answerUserId,ip, answer, status, createTime, lastUpdate, isAccept
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, parentId, questionId,factionId,commentNum,likeNum,trampleNum,reportNum, a.userId,u.userPicturePath,u.nickname, answerUserId,ip, answer, a.status, a.createTime, a.lastUpdate, isAccept FROM bb_question_answer a left join bb_user u on a.userId = u.id WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT a.id, parentId, questionId,q.collectNum,q.answerNum,a.commentNum,a.likeNum,a.trampleNum, a.userId,u.userPicturePath,u.nickname, (SELECT nickname FROM bb_user where id = answerUserId) answerNickname, answerUserId,a.ip, answer, a.status, a.createTime, a.lastUpdate, isAccept, q.title questionTitle FROM bb_question_answer a LEFT JOIN bb_question q on a.questionId = q.id left join bb_user u on a.userId = u.id WHERE parentId='' ORDER BY createTime DESC

SELECT factionId FROM bb_question_faction_classify where factionId in(SELECT factionId FROM bb_question_faction_member where userId = #{userId}) and classifyId = (SELECT classifyCode FROM bb_question where id = #{questionId}) limit 1
SELECT count(id) FROM bb_question_answer WHERE parentId != '' and questionId = #{questionId}
SELECT count(id) FROM bb_question_answer WHERE parentId = #{id}
